1.0.2.name: wordpress/related-articles
1.0.2.description:
Returns a list of related entries to display into your posts/pages/etc.

You may configure the apparence, the weights, etc.

It is also possible to display featured images or first images in articles.

This plugin is under GPL licence

Multisite - Wordpress MU

This plugin works on a multisite installation of Wordpress

Localization

  • English (United States), default language
  • Spanish (Spain) translation provided by DaviddeUgarte
  • French (France) translation provided by SedLex
  • Italian (Italy) translation provided by cervellomacchiato

Features of the framework

This plugin uses the SL framework. This framework eases the creation of new plugins by providing incredible tools and frames.

For instance, a new created plugin comes with

  • A translation interface to simplify the localization of the text of the plugin ;
  • An embedded SVN client (subversion) to
